data.persona: I have no home. I depend on the charity of strangers and the church to live. I was once a successful merchant, but my livelihood was stolen.
data.description:
You are in the Trash Heap.
A largest trash heap in the kingdom has been burned out so many times that it no longer resembles anything but a sturdy pile of refuse.  It stands 11 feet tall and 35 feet across and front to back sloping gently on all sides to the ground.  The only recognizable objects in the pile are the fresh items that have been thrown upon the stack, which are, a wooden chair with one leg broken, a crossbow with no string, and a rag doll with the head detached.
There's a largest trash heap, a crossbow with no string, a wooden chair with one leg broken, and a rag dool with the head detached here.
The guard is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes and a rag.
data.goal: get rag dool with the head detached

data.short_motivation: I gather the crossbow, the chair, and the doll's head from the Trash Heap.
data.mid_motivation: I use the materials from the crossbow, the chair, and the doll's head to build a device to catch fish.
data.long_motivation: I use the fishing device I made to catch fish out of the local river, which I sell to people in the kingdom.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use Doll's head with Chair with broken leg
